channel.title: Compiler and environmental variables
channel.description:
can anyone help me with these? i've been trying to get em to work for 3 days now. i'll even use team viewer.
PATH C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin
Compiler code @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause
if anyone would team viewer me that would be much appreciated!! anyone?

item.title: Compiler and environmental variables
item.dc:creator: @Frosty26 Frosty26
item.description:
@Frosty26 wrote:

can anyone help me with these? i’ve been trying to get em to work for 3 days now. i’ll even use team viewer.

PATH
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin

Compiler code
@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe” -d ./Class/ Java/.java Java/sign/.java
pause

if anyone would team viewer me that would be much appreciated!! anyone?
